short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plustek Automation extension to automate web applications in Google Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Plustek Automation integration with Google Chrome.

This extension allows Plustek RPA software to automate web applications in Google Chrome.

Using Plustek RPA software, a user can automate web and desktop applications for those manual, repetitive and rule-based tasks, which are mundane and error-prone for human workers, and turn your computer into a productive digital worker.
